        public io.jaegertracing.Configuration.SamplerConfiguration getSamplerConfiguration()
        Returns:
        The Configuration.SamplerConfiguration

      • setProbability

        public void setProbability(float probability)
        Sets the sampler probability used by the default CountingSampler. A value of 1.0 indicates to sample all requests. A value of 0.1 indicates to sample 10% of requests.
        Parameters:
        probability - The sampler probability
